channel.title: [508 Palidino] List of things I need help with. [Posted like 5 times already]
channel.description:
I have a 508 server that is blank and I want to start off by doing the following.
-How to change Home & Death Spawn -How to Add Commands -How to Make NPC's Talk (If its like 317 then I know how, but tell me its the same thing) -How to Make ::pnpc, ::unpnpc, ::npc

item.title: [508 Palidino] List of things I need help with. [Posted like 5 times already]
item.dc:creator: @LahainaGeneration LahainaGeneration
item.description:
@LahainaGeneration wrote:

[quote=“bl00dpk, post:2, topic:385731”]-to change home you havee to move all shops and stuff’ from yur old home to new one by going to spawnconfig.java and then go to src/server/model/player/packets/clickingbuttons and then find the current code of yur home teleport and change them to the one you want.

-Changing death spawn go to src/server/config.java and find RESPAWN_x or your current spawn coords and change them to the ones you want.

-to add commands go to src/server/model/player/packets/commands.java and then find a commandd similar to a one you want and paste it under neath and change the coords and stuff if its a tele command.

  • http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3BhEJKxxASo (this video is not by me) watch these to make npc,s talk

                                                                                                         -Bl00dpk[/quote]

I don’t have Config.java, or clickingbuttons. ActionButtons doesnt have spawn or anything else

Read full topic
item.source: [508 Palidino] List of things I need help with. [Posted like 5 times already]

item.title: [508 Palidino] List of things I need help with. [Posted like 5 times already]
item.dc:creator: @bl00dpk bl00dpk
item.description:
@bl00dpk wrote:

-to change home you havee to move all shops and stuff’ from yur old home to new one by going to spawnconfig.java and then go to src/server/model/player/packets/clickingbuttons and then find the current code of yur home teleport and change them to the one you want.

-Changing death spawn go to src/server/config.java and find RESPAWN_x or your current spawn coords and change them to the ones you want.

-to add commands go to src/server/model/player/packets/commands.java and then find a commandd similar to a one you want and paste it under neath and change the coords and stuff if its a tele command.

  • http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3BhEJKxxASo (this video is not by me) watch these to make npc,s talk

                                                                                                         -Bl00dpk
